title: Integration Works
description: Berlin Tech hackathon 3rd Place Winner. An app for navigating the legal boundaries of the hiring process of refugees in Germany.

title: Priicer
description: EKM Metering Inc. An app to measure meters and automatically turn on and off household appliances based on the price of electricity.
